trans-unit.source: Azure Privileged Identity Management: How To Change or View the Default Settings for a Role
trans-unit.target: Azure Privileged Identity Management: How To Change or View the Default Settings for a Role

trans-unit.source: Learn how to change the default settings for privileged identities with the Azure Privileged Identity Management extension.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to change the default settings for privileged identities with the Azure Privileged Identity Management extension.

trans-unit.source: Azure Privileged Identity Management: How To Change or View the Default Activation Settings for a Role
trans-unit.target: Azure Privileged Identity Management: How To Change or View the Default Activation Settings for a Role

trans-unit.source: Changing and Viewing the Default Role Activation
trans-unit.target: Changing and Viewing the Default Role Activation

trans-unit.source: From the dashboard, click on the role to be configured from the roles table.
trans-unit.target: From the dashboard, click on the role to be configured from the roles table.

trans-unit.source: Set the default activation duration in hours by adjusting the slider or entering the number of hours in the text field.
trans-unit.target: Set the default activation duration in hours by adjusting the slider or entering the number of hours in the text field.

trans-unit.source: Click **Enable** or **Disable** If you would like notifications about the activation sent to administrators or not.
trans-unit.target: Click **Enable** or **Disable** If you would like notifications about the activation sent to administrators or not.

trans-unit.source: Click **Enable** or **Disable** to allow administrators to enter tickeing information into their activation request or not.
trans-unit.target: Click **Enable** or **Disable** to allow administrators to enter tickeing information into their activation request or not.

trans-unit.source: Click **Enable** or **Disable** to require multi-factor authentication for an activation request or not.
trans-unit.target: Click **Enable** or **Disable** to require multi-factor authentication for an activation request or not.

trans-unit.source: For more information about using MFA with PIM see [How to Require MFA](active-directory-privileged-identity-management-how-to-require-mfa.md).
trans-unit.target: For more information about using MFA with PIM see [How to Require MFA](active-directory-privileged-identity-management-how-to-require-mfa.md).

trans-unit.source: Click **Enable** or **Disable** to allow Global Administrators to be temporary.
trans-unit.target: Click **Enable** or **Disable** to allow Global Administrators to be temporary.

trans-unit.source: For more information about this setting see below.
trans-unit.target: For more information about this setting see below.
